description: A TypeScript library for zooming any element. Also supports mobile devices.

keywords.basic-usage: Add Zoomist HTML layout, Customize Zoomist styles, Initialize Zoomist
keywords.parameters-options: Zoomist instance, zoomistElement, zoomistOptions, bounds, draggable, wheelable, pinchable, minScale, maxScale, initScale, zoomRatio, slider, zoomer, el, direction, inEl, outEl, resetEl, disabledClass
keywords.methods-properties: zoom, zoomTo, move, moveTo, slideTo, reset, destroy, destroySlider, destroyZoomer, destroyModules, update, getContainerData, getImageData, getSliderValue, on, element, wrapper, image, options, mounted, states, transform, data
keywords.events: ready, reset, resize, beforeDestroy, destroy, beforeUpdate, update, zoom, wheel, dragStart, drag, dragEnd, pinchStart, pinch, pinchEnd, slideStart, slide, slideEnd
